channel.title: Making an item only equitable for killing 10 players. Rep++ for answer
channel.description:
How to I makw an item only equitable for killing 10 players? Like if I make a Cape Of Pking, I would like it so only players who have kill 10+ players can wear it.
Server: DELTA
Rep++ for answer.
Thanks,
